General.Name: BNK Financial Group Inc
General.Description: BNK Financial Group Inc., together with its subsidiaries, provides various financial products and services in South Korea and internationally. The company offers personal, auto mobile, leasing, instalment and corporate, and investment finance; and investment brokerage and trading, venture asset management, investment advisory and collective investment, and system software development and supply services. It also provides specialized credit financial, digital finance, securities, and asset management services; and debt collection and credit investigation, and collection agency services, as well as operates as a savings bank. The company was formerly known as BS Financial Group Inc. and changed its name to BNK Financial Group Inc. in April 2015. BNK Financial Group Inc. was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Busan, South Korea.
